sn27.10:1.2: “Yo, bhikkhave, rupasmim chandarago, cittasseso upakkileso …pe… yo vinnanasmim chandarago, cittasseso upakkileso.
sn27.10:1.3: Yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno imesu pancasu thanesu cetaso upakkileso pahino hoti, nekkhammaninnancassa cittam hoti.
sn27.10:1.4: Nekkhammaparibhavitam cittam kammaniyam khayati, abhinna sacchikaraniyesu dhammesu”ti.
